[color=blue]NOTES:[/color]
Right this is a mixture of anton studios cam dvdr muxed with some sweet audio from fatal ;-)
The video has Spanish, Portuguesse,Swedish,German and Dutch subs files through out and as antons normal watermark.....
quailty wise one of the best if not the best anton as done....full marks :)
Audio sounds sweet and don't get much better than this....but thats nothing new when it comes to
fatals audio tracks.


[color=blue]WORK DONE:[/color] 
First of all audio work is done by fatal himself......many thanks :)
The video i have removed the custom menu and cropped the black borders and also needed to crop some off
the right handside due to the camera movement (not much though).
Filtering was i just lowered the rgb black base to remove some of the glare....added a touch more contrast and chroma and
also used a sharpen and contour filter to give it that extra bit....
Oh and also ran a video noise reduction over it ....only on a low setting though,just to clean it that bit more.

Overall based on a TS V8.5 A8.5 M 6.............Movie looks ok,but not my sort of thing .....Quality wise,if it wasn't for the subs this
would be a really nice TS and of high quality.Aslong as you don't mind the subs this will do most until the R5 comes out.
Enjoy ;-)

Update.....just scrolled through this and i lmao of some of the stuff,might have to watch it all now :P
